articles.title: People with better physical fitness are less likely to develop Alzheimer's disease - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: People who are more physically fit are less likely to develop Alzheimer's disease than people who are less physically fit, according to a preliminary study released today, February 27, 2022, that will be presented at the American Academy of Neurology's 74th A…
